Title: Design WPF & Silverlight Apps in Word2007
Description:
the goals from this project are
1- Design WPF & Silverlight Apps by using  Word2007 shapes , images , SmartArts.
2- Animate the objects (shapes) and create simple storyboards and triggers.
3- export the done work into WPF or SL applications or UserControl or  XAML text

Project Description
The goals from this project are
